entry.title: Ideal Innovations 60-5429 - Stop And Go Led Without Flasher & Switch
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ideal Innovations
Type: Traffic Control
Price: 241.06

[shortdesc]
  • SG30 system utilizes two units
  • Stop and go signaling systems alerts truck drivers and dock personnel to the safety status of docked or docking trucks
  • One outside (communicate with driver) and one inside (communicate with dock operator/attendant) SG10 system is available for applications where opposing signals are not required
  • Loading dock warning signs available: Increase dock safety
  • High contrast and visibility
  • Simple and direct instruction
  • Durable and light weight
  • Inside of building warning sign 12 Inch x 12 Inch
  • Outside of building warning sign 12 Inch x 24 Inch (standard and mirrored text on same sign).
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Ideal Innovations
    Color Yellow
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Traffic Control

    Product Information

  • Housing: Safety yellow (durable plastic will not rust, pit or corrode).
  • Power source: 115 volt AC operation (consult factory for other options).
  • Lens diameter: 4-1/2 Inch
  • Measures 11-3/8 Inch height by 6-3/8 Inch width by 3-3/4 Inch depth.
    		•

entry.title: Ideal Innovations 60-5305 - Ed Dock Guide Light - 120V (Set Of 2)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ideal Innovations
Type: Traffic Control
Price: 508.74

[shortdesc]
  • Ideal Innovations LED Loading Dock Guide Light Set provides drivers with a visual target to align the truck trailer with the dock door
  • The Guide Light Set is especially useful in low-light environments like enclosed dock bays, and is bright enough to improve visibility of the dock opening even in daylight! The guide lights may also be installed inside the building to mark the door openings for forklift operators and other warehouse personnel.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Ideal Innovations
    Color Orange
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Traffic Control

    Product Information

  • 120v
  • Long-life LEDs reduce replacement costs and down time.
  • High impact polycarbonate housing resists shocks and vibrations.
  • Uses 50 bright LEDs per light fixture.
    		•

entry.title: Ideal Innovations 60-6510-A-GRY - 36 Inch Parking Block Grey For Asphalt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ideal Innovations
Type: Parking Blocks
Price: 32.03

[shortdesc]
  • Simple, affordable and colorful! Eliminate brittle concrete replacements with 100% recycled plastic parking blocks engineered to prevent warp, crack, chip and rot
  • Unlimited design possibilities with modular design and multiple colours - Safety Yellow, Grey or Blue.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Ideal Innovations
    Color Grey
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Parking Blocks

    Product Information

  • 36 Inch long sections are perfectly joined together with a special InchU Inch channel clip.
  • Recommended fastening with 12 Inch spikes or 8 Inch lag bolts with concrete anchors.
  • Specify for asphalt or concrete.
    		•

entry.title: Ideal Innovations 60-6550-A-BLK - 36 Inch Econo Light Speed Bump Black For Asphalt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ideal Innovations
Type: Parking Safety
Price: 50.87

[shortdesc]
  • The World's lightest modular rubber speed bump! It will never rot, chip or corrode and is made of recycled PVC.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Ideal Innovations
    Color Black, Yellow
    Material PVC
    Origin Country Canada
    Product Type Parking Safety

    Product Information

  • 36 Inch long sections are perfectly joined together with a special channel clip and end cap is also provided for a smooth look.
  • To form a standard speed bump system section (72 Inch long) with hardware (spikes or lags), you will require (2) 36 Inch sections, (2) end caps, and one (1) connector
  • Main pieces (36 Inch long) may be added and connected to form larger units.
  • Weighs only 10lbs./pc
  • and ships at a fraction of the cost of heavier speed bumps.
    		•
